1 non-EARTH "Elemendjin" monster

side.effect:
2 Level 10 Zombie monsters
This card's name becomes "Eldlich the Golden Lord" while on the field or in the GY. You can only use each effect of "Eldlich the Silver Lord" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from an Xyz Monster you control and send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand to the GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then you can shuffle up to 3 banished cards into the Deck. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Spell/Trap you control; Special Summon this card, and if you do, attach that target to it as material, also until the end of your opponent's turn, it gains 1000 ATK/DEF and cannot be destroyed by card effects.

side.effect:
1 "Eldlich" monster + 1 "Golden Land" monster
This card's name becomes "Eldlich the Golden Lord" while on the field. Your opponent cannot target "Golden Land" cards you control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent’s card effects. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Zombie monster; Special Summon 1 "Eldlich" monster from your Deck or that is banished, or if you Tributed "Eldlich the Golden Lord" you can Special Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck that mentions it instead. side.effect:
1 Synchro or Xyz Monster + 1 Synchro or Xyz Monster

1 Synchro or Xyz Monster + 1 Synchro or Xyz Monster

side.effect:
1 monster you control + 9 cards you own

Once per turn, while this card is treated as a Continuous Trap, you can banish 1 card from your opponent's GY if a "Machine Mother" monster is moved from your Pendulum Zone.

main.effect: Add 1 "Ghoti" monster from your Deck to your hand. main.effect: You can banish this card from your GY, except the turn it was sent there; add 1 "Dragunity" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is equipped to a "Dragunity" monster: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Dragunity Hasta" once per turn.

main.effect:
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Dragon monsters. During your Main Phase: You can activate 1 of these effects.

●If you control "Dragon Ravine": Special Summon 1 level 4 or lower Winged Beast "Dragunity" monster from your Deck, but negate its effects.

You can only use this effect of "Dragunity Drill" once per turn.

main.effect: Cannot be used as Synchro Material, except for the Synchro Summon of a "Dragunity" monster. This card on the field can be treated as a Level 4 monster when used for a Synchro Summon. If this card is currently equipped to a monster: You can Special Summon this equipped card.

main.effect:
It once was a caterpillar,
That rested here and there,
Once It took a sip of the Waters That Evær'Wood,
It grew into a beast, faster than things That Never Could.
- That Evær'Wood Vol. 1
main.name: Dragon-Fly That Evær'Wood
main.pendulum_effect: When a monster(s) "That Evær'Wood" you control are destroyed, you can place any number of them in your Spell & Trap Zone(s) as Continuous Traps, instead of placing them in the face-up Extra Deck. Pendulum Monsters placed this way gain their Pendulum Effects. During the Main Phase: You can add 1 card "That Evær'Wood" from your Deck to your hand or, if this card is a Continuous Trap, shuffle 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls into the Deck instead. You can only use this effect of "Dragon-Fly That Evær'Wood" once per turn.

main.effect: Your opponent cannot target face-up Spells/Traps you control that mention “Adventurer Token” with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent’s card effects. main.effect: If there is a Counter Trap in either GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). main.effect:
Roll a six-sided die twice, then excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to the larger number rolled, and if you do, apply 1 of these effects, depending on the number of Field Spells you excavated, also shuffle the rest into your Deck (if any).
● 0: Banish 1 card from your hand or GY, face-down.
● 1 or 2: Add as many excavated Field Spells to your hand as possible.
● 3 or 4: Choose 2 excavated Field Spells, and place 1 in your Field Zone and the other in your opponent's Field Zone, face-up.
● 5 or 6: Add 1 excavated card to your hand, then, immediately after this Chain resolves, draw 2 cards.
You can only activate 1 "Expeditioning" per turn.

main.effect: If you control a Level 4 or lower Spellcaster monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can take 1 Normal Spell from your Deck and place it on top of your Deck, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name until the end of your next turn. If this card is in the GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Spellcaster monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Living Library of Light" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

main.effect: If you control an "Anti-Goo" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Anti-Goo" monsters. If this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Anti-Goo" monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Anti-Goo" monsters. You can only use 1 "Lisa the Anti-Goo Gunner" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

main.effect: If you control no monsters in your Main Monster Zones, or the only face-up monster(s) you control in your Main Monster Zones are "Goo-F" monsters (min. 1): Target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip this card to it. A monster equipped with this card has its effects negated, its name becomes "Goo Trapped Lion", also its ATK/DEF become 1500, and it cannot be used as material for the Summon of a monster from the Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "Lion Goo-Fication" once per turn. If you have a "Goo-F" monster in your GY, you can activate this card from your hand during your turn.

main.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned, its original ATK becomes 1000. You can only use this effect of "Lilith, Lady of Lament" once per turn.

main.effect: You can discard this card; send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if you do, you can add 1 "Lightray" card that is banished or in your GY to your hand, except "Lightray Parshath". main.effect: If your opponent draws a card(s): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. main.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Libromancer" card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on the field; until the end of your next Battle Phase, this card can attack while in face-up Defense Position, but if it does, apply its DEF for damage calculation, also return 1 monster you control to the hand, and if you do, negate that target’s effects until the End Phase. If this card is returned from the field to the hand: You can draw 1 card.

main.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Libromancer" card. As it beckoned Hasth into it's lake,
To soothe the wounds that still ache,
T'is a reminder to not wade in rivers That Evær'Wood,
For all that emerges are things That Never Could.

● WIND: If a "Kotodama" monster is placed in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell: You can activate this effect; this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Kotodama" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
If this card is Normal Summoned, or if it is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone: You can return this card to the hand, and if you do, you can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using "Kotodama" Monster Cards from your Spell & Trap Zone as Fusion Material. main.effect:

●Target 1 Set Spell/Trap you control; Special Summon this card, and if you do, destroy that target.
●Target 1 Set card on the field; destroy that target.

main.effect: Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by banishing at least 2 Fish "Carcharrack" monsters with different names from your hand, field, and/or GY, and cannot be Summoned by other ways. main.effect:
(This card is also always treated as a Rock monster.)
Cannot be Tributed, or used as Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Material. main.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 2 cards from your hand to the GY. You cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. main.effect:
If you activate a card or effect that includes an effect that reveals a card in your opponent's possession except "Kairos, the Fateweaver": You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, and if you do, destroy 1 face-up card on the field. If this card is sent to the GY: You can apply 1 of the following effects (but you cannot apply the same effect of "Kairos, the Fateweaver" again this Duel). ● Reveal your opponent's hand
● Reveal your opponent's Deck
● Reveal all Set cards your opponent controls
● Reveal your opponent's Extra Deck.

extra.effect:
2 Rank/Link-2 Aqua monsters
If you Xyz Summon this card using Xyz Monsters as material, transfer their materials to this card. This card is unaffected by other monsters' effects. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. While this card has a Trap Card as material, if your "Paleozoic" monster attacks your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
extra.name: Paleozoic Ursulinacaris

side.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Each time a card is destroyed, you can inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed. Once per chain, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; apply 1 of the following effects (but you cannot apply that same effect of "Raijin, Sora ni sumu" again this turn).
● Destroy all face-up cards you control in adjacent columns to this card, and if you do, destroy all Set cards your opponent controls in adjacent columns to that target.
● Destroy all Set cards you control in adjacent columns to this card, and if you do, destroy all face-up cards your opponent controls in adjacent columns to that target.
side.name: Raijin, Sora ni sumu

side.effect:
2 Level 4 Winged Beast monsters
Gains 500 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. You can only use each of the following effects of "Raidraptor - Future Falcon" once per turn. You can detach up to 2 materials from this card; destroy that many Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, take 1000 damage for each monster destroyed. This is a Quick Effect if all the materials attached to this card are "Raidraptor" monsters. If this card or a Rank 5 or higher "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can banish 1 "Raidraptor" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card from your GY, and if you do, attach up to 2 monsters from your hand or GY to it as material.
side.name: Raidraptor - Future Falcon

side.effect:
2 Level 12 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Radiant Witch CALLI-OPUS - Boundless Knowledge" by using 1 monster you control that is not a Monster Card that battled this turn as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Radiant Witch CALLI-OPUS - Boundless Knowledge" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can place 1 monster your opponent controls face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; Set 1 Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with the same name as that card until the end of the next turn.
side.name: Radiant Witch CALLI-OPUS - Boundless Knowledge

side.effect:
2 Level 10 monsters 
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Queldaria of the Calm Depths" by using 2 monsters you control that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set as material. Up to thrice per turn, each time an activated card or effect resolves, attach the top card of the turn player's opponent's Deck to this card as material, then this card gains 200 ATK/DEF. If you control this Xyz Summoned card (Quick Effect): You can detach up to 6 materials from this card in groups of 2, then, for every 2 materials detached, activate 1 of these effects, depending on the monsters used as material for this card. 
● With a Level: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return it to the hand.
● Without a Level: Draw 1 card, and if you do, shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck. 
You can only use this effect of "Queldaria of the Calm Depths" once per turn.
side.name: Queldaria of the Calm Depths

side.effect:
2 Level 4 "Qli" monsters
Once per turn, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; Set 1 "Qli" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your Spell & Trap Zone, except a Field Spell, also it can be activated this turn. If this card is Tributed: You can target any number of Machine Pendulum Monsters in your GY, including a "Qli" monster; add them to your Extra Deck, face-up, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Qliphort Walker" once per turn.
side.name: Qliphort Walker

side.effect:
2 "Qliphort" monsters
Must first be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by Tributing the above cards you control. Once per turn: You can add 1 "Laser Qlip" from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is Tributed: You can return 1 "Qliphort" Monster Card in your Pendulum Zone to your hand, then you can place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only Special Summon "Qliphort Resonance(s)" once per turn.
side.name: Qliphort Resonance
side.pendulum_effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Qli" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. "Qliphort" monsters you control cannot be targeted by the effects of your opponent's Link Monsters.

side.effect:
1 Pyro Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Pyro monsters
If this card Synchro Summoned: You can return up to 5 Pyro monsters in your GY and/or banishment to the bottom of the Deck, except "Pyroclastic Hammer-Head", then, if you returned 3 or more monsters to the Deck or Extra Deck this way, draw 1 card. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card on the field; banish it, and if you do, shuffle 1 banished card into its owner's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Pyroclastic Hammer-Head" once per turn.
side.name: Pyroclastic Hammer-Head

side.effect:
1 Link 3 or higher Link Monster
The original ATK of this card becomes 500 x the combined Link Ratings of all Link Monsters with different names in your GY. If this card is Link Summoned during your turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Purifyre, Ethereal of Punishment" once per turn.
side.name: Purifyre, Ethereal of Punishment

side.effect:
3 x "Pumpkinhead"
Must first be Fusion Summoned using the above materials. Cannot be destroyed by battle with "Pumpkinhead" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls or in their GY; that target's name becomes "Pumpkinhead", also all "Pumpkinhead" currently in your opponent's possession have their effects negated until the end of this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 Normal Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand that mentions "Pumpkinhead". You can only use each effect of "Pumpkin Rolling into the Night" once per turn.
side.name: Pumpkin Rolling into the Night

side.effect:
2 Psychic Effect Monsters
During your Main Phase: You can target 1 Psychic monster in your GY, except "Psyched Psyche"; banish it, and if you do, banish 1 face-up monster this card points to. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Psyched Psyche" once per turn.
side.name: Psyched Psyche

side.effect:
2 Level 2 monsters
If this is Xyz Summoned using a Beast monster as material: You can activate this effect; banish 1 card from the GYs. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it, then, if that detached material was a LIGHT or DARK Monster Card, you can Set that destroyed card to your field, but it cannot be activated until the end of your opponent's next turn, and if you do that, lose 2000 LP. You can only use each effect of "Psycatastrophe" once per turn.
side.name: Psycatastrophe

side.effect:
2 EARTH Warrior monsters
This card and Warrior monsters this card points to gain 600 ATK during your opponent's turn only. You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Level 4 or lower EARTH Warrior monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it cannot be used as Link Material for a Link Summon involving this card. You can only use this effect of "Provocator" once per turn.
side.name: Provocator

side.effect:
3 monsters with different Attributes, including 1 EARTH or 1 WIND monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can shuffle any number of monsters used as material for its Fusion Summon into the Deck. Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each card in the Extra Decks. You can destroy 1 card you control, and if you do, shuffle 1 card your opponent controls into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Providence Sovereign Kaiser" once per turn. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed or banished: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone.
side.name: Providence Sovereign Kaiser
side.pendulum_effect: Monsters your opponent control lose 500 ATK for each card in the Extra Decks. Once per turn, you can negate an activated card effect that would shuffle a card(s) into the Deck or Extra Deck by shuffling 1 card you control into the Deck, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck.

side.effect: Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing 3 "Protogen" monsters from your hand, field, or GY. If banishing a Link Monster(s) this way, you can treat it as an equal number of monsters as its Link Rating. When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Protogen" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 banished "Protogen" monster. You can only use 1 "Protogen.Subject.Zeta.Despair" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
side.name: Protogen.Subject.Zeta.Despair

side.effect:
2+ "Protogen" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Set 1 "Protogen" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use this effect of "Protogen.Subject.Omicron.Void" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can have this card become unaffected by other card effects until the end of this Chain. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this effect's activation. You can only Link Summon 1 "Protogen.Subject.Omicron.Void" per turn.
side.name: Protogen.Subject.Omicron.Void

main.effect: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Thunder monster on the field; equip this card to it, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; both this card and that target's Level becomes 4, then, you can make this card become a Tuner. If this card is sent to the GY: You can equip this card to a "Rallyence" monster you control. You can only use this effect of "Rallyence - Vermillionaire" once per turn.
main.name: Rallyence - Vermillionaire

main.effect:
Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Thunder monster on the field; equip this card to it, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card gains 450 ATK, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy this card instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Rallyence - The Top Brass" once per turn.
● You can discard 1 monster; add 1 "Rallyence" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
● If this card is sent to the GY: You can send 1 "Rallyence" monster from your Deck to the GY.
main.name: Rallyence - The Top Brass

main.effect:
Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Thunder monster on the field; equip this card to it, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Rallyence - High-Roll Derby Dame" once per turn.
● During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand; send 1 Union Monster Card from your field to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card OR destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
● If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Rallyence" Monster Card from your hand or Spell & Trap Zone.
main.name: Rallyence - High-Roll Derby Dame

main.effect:
Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Thunder monster on the field; equip this card to it, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Rallyence - Concrete Jungle King" once per turn.
● You can send 1 Union Monster Card from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand.
● During the Main Phase: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; move it to this card's column, and if you do, its effects are negated and its ATK becomes 0. This is a Quick Effect if this card is the only card in its column.
main.name: Rallyence - Concrete Jungle King

main.effect: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Thunder monster on the field; equip this card to it, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A Tuner equipped with this card is no longer treated as a Tuner, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. If this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, then, destroy 1 Union Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use this effect of "Rallyence - Big Wheeler-Dealer" once per turn.
main.name: Rallyence - Big Wheeler-Dealer

main.effect: Discard 1 card; place up to 2 Normal or Gemini Pendulum Monsters with the same Type and/or Attribute but different names from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone(s). You can only activate 1 "Rainbow Flush!" per turn.
main.name: Rainbow Flush!

main.effect: If you control no monsters: You can reveal 1 other "Raidraptor" Monster in your hand; Special Summon this monster from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned from your hand: You can add 1 "Raidraptor - Nest" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Raidraptor - Hard Foiled Egg" once per turn.
main.name: Raidraptor - Hard Foiled Egg

main.effect: You can reveal 1 "Raidraptor" monster in your hand or Deck, except “Raidraptor - Freedom Lanius”; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card's Level becomes the Level of the revealed monster. If you control a DARK Xyz monster: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 “Rank-Up-Magic” Spell in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of “Raidraptor Freedom Lanius” once per turn.
main.name: Raidraptor - Freedom Lanius

main.effect: If another Spell/Trap Card is activated: Target 1 monster on the turn player's opponent's field; destroy it. If a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the turn player's opponent's field; destroy it. If this face-up card on the field is destroyed by card effect: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Ragh Nar Roog" once per turn.
main.name: Ragh Nar Roog

main.effect:
(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Fairy.)
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per Chain, if either player takes damage: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Rage-Awakened Beholder" per turn, and only once that turn.
● If you take damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. 
● During the End Phase: Inflict 2000 damage to each player.
main.name: Rage-Awakened Beholder

main.effect: You can discard this card and 1 other "Ka-aeon" card; draw 2 cards. If this card was attached to an Xyz Monster and is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Ka-aeon" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ra, Ruler of the Ka-aeon" once per turn.
main.name: Ra, Ruler of the Ka-aeon

main.effect:
If this card is Summoned: You can toss a coin 3 times; apply the appropriate effects in sequence based on the number of heads.
●1+: Destroy 1 face-up card on the field.
●2+: Draw 1 card.
●3: Special Summon 1 monster with a coin tossing effect from your GY.
You can only use this effect of "RM-4 Blast Sphere" once per turn. If this card is destroyed, except from the Spell & Trap Zone: You can equip this card to 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, also while equipped this card’s name becomes "Blast Sphere". During the Standby Phase, if this card is equipped to a monster: Destroy that monster, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK on the field.
main.name: RM-4 Blast Sphere

main.effect: If only you control a Fiend monster, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards. If you control no Fiend monsters, you cannot activate Trap Cards.
main.name: R'lyeh, Prison City of the Old One
main.treated_as: R'lyeh, Prison City of the Old One

main.effect: If you control a "Qli" card(s): Special Summon 1 "Qli" monster from your Deck. You can banish this card from your GY and shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; add 1 "Qli" card from your face-up Extra Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Qlimpact" once per turn.
main.name: Qlimpact

main.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Purrely" card from your Deck to your hand, except a Quick-Play Spell. You can target 1 "Purrely" Quick-Play Spell in your GY; Special Summon 1 Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck that mentions that card, by using this card you control as material, and if you do, attach that Spell to the Summoned monster. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use each effect of "Purrelyly" once per turn.
main.name: Purrelyly

main.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "Purrely" Spell/Trap to your hand, also place the rest on the bottom of your Deck in any order. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can reveal 1 "Purrely" Quick-Play Spell in your hand, Special Summon 1 Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck that mentions that card, by using this card you control as material, and attach the revealed card to the Summoned monster. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.)
main.name: Purrely

main.effect: Destroy cards your opponent controls, up to the number of cards you drew this turn.
main.name: Purr Macabre

main.effect: Send 1 "Animathos" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Animathos Purity Token" (Fairy/Thunder/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100), also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn. During your Main Phase, if there are 3 or more Fusion Monsters in your GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Level 3 or lower "Animathos" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only activate 1 "Pure Animathos" per turn.
main.name: Pure Animathos

main.effect: Once per turn, if a player takes effect damage: Their opponent targets 1 card on the field; they destroy it.
main.name: Puppet Room

main.effect: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are Fusion Monsters (min. 1), you can activate this card from your hand. Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; the names of all cards in your opponent's possession with the same original name as that target become "Pumpkinhead" until the end of this turn.
main.name: Pumpkin, Pumpkin Eater

main.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● If you control a face-up "LaVoix" card: Target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it.
● Discard 1 "LaVoix" card, then draw 2 cards.
You can only activate 1 "Prévoyance DeLaVoix" per turn.
main.name: Prévoyance DeLaVoix

main.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated on the field, while you control no face-up Spell Cards: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, and if you do that, immediately after this effect resolves, Ritual Summon 1 "Aethery" Ritual Monster from your hand or GY, by Tributing 1 monster from your hand or field whose Level equals or exceeds the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. Until the end of your next turn after this effect resolves, you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters, except "Aethery" Ritual Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Prudence of the Aethery" per turn.
main.name: Prudence of the Aethery

main.effect: Target 1 "Protogen" monster you control that has activated its effect this turn and 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate their effects until the end of this turn, then, if this card was activated in a Chain in which your targeted monster activated its effect before this card, destroy your opponent's card immediately after this Chain resolves. You can only activate 1 "ProtogenxxFateful.Encounter" per turn.
main.name: ProtogenxxFateful.Encounter

main.effect:
Immediately after a Chain in which a "Protogen" card or effect was activated resolves: You can activate 1 of these effects, up to the total Chain Link number of that Chain.
● 1+: This turn, "Protogen" monsters you control gain ATK equal to 100 x the Chain Link number of that Chain.
● 2+: Special Summon 1 "Protogen" monster from your hand.
● 3+: Send 1 "Protogen" monster from your Deck to the GY.
● 4+: Special Summon 1 "Protogen" monster from your GY.
● 5+: Activate any 2 of the above effects.
You can only use this effect of "Protogen@@Field.of.Dreams" once per turn.
main.name: Protogen@@Field.of.Dreams

main.effect: Add 1 "Protogen" card from your Deck to your hand, then, if this card was activated in a Chain in which 3 or more cards or effects were activated before this card resolves, you can draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Protogen>>Looking.to.the.Future" per turn.
main.name: Protogen>>Looking.to.the.Future

main.effect: When your "Protogen" card activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Protogen.Subject.Theta.Dreamer" once per turn.
main.name: Protogen.Subject.Theta.Dreamer

main.effect: If this card is currently banished (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other banished "Protogen" monster; return it to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Protogen.Subject.Tau.Planner" once per turn.
main.name: Protogen.Subject.Tau.Planner

main.effect: (Quick Effect): You can send 1 "Protogen" card from your hand or field to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Protogen.Subject.Sigma.Gatherer" once per turn.
main.name: Protogen.Subject.Sigma.Gatherer

main.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Protogen" monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Protogen.Subject.Beta.Traveler" once per turn.
main.name: Protogen.Subject.Beta.Traveler

main.effect: Equip only to a "Protogen" monster you control. The equipped monster cannot be targeted by cards or effects that activate as Chain Link 1. If the equipped monster activates its effect: It gains 500 ATK. If the equipped monster declares an attack on an opponent's monster: Negate the effects of that monster (including in the GY). You can only activate 1 "Protogen++Strikeout.Bludgeon" per turn.
main.name: Protogen++Strikeout.Bludgeon

main.effect: Special Summon 1 "Protogen" monster from your hand or GY, then, if this card was activated as Chain Link 3 or higher, you can Special Summon 1 "Protogen Token" (LIGHT/Cyberse/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only activate 1 "ProtogenSpark.of.Science" per turn.
main.name: Protogen**Spark.of.Science

main.effect: When your opponent activates a card or effect while you control a "Protogen" card: Negate the activation, then, if your opponent activated that card or effect in response to the activation of a "Protogen" card or effect, you can negate all other cards and effects your opponent has activated before this card in this Chain. You can only activate 1 "Protogen!!Surprise.Attack" per turn.
main.name: Protogen!!Surprise.Attack

main.effect: During your turn: Target 2 monsters on the field; destroy 1 of those targets, and if you do, the other target cannot be destroyed by card effects until the End Phase. If this card was activated as Chain Link 3 or higher, neither player can activate monster effects in response to this card's activation.
main.name: Protective Aggression

main.effect: This card’s name becomes “Project “Okuu”, Armamegiddo Monochromis” while in the hand or face-up in your possession. If you Normal or Special Summon an “Armamegiddo” monster(s): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is used as material for the Summon of an "Utsuho Reiuji" monster: You can place 1 “Armamegiddo” Continuous Spell/Trap from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each effect of “Project “Okuu”, Armamegiddo Phasmochloris” once per turn.
main.name: Project “Okuu”, Armamegiddo Phasmochloris

main.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can reveal 3 “Armamegiddo” Spells/Traps from your Deck, your opponent randomly chooses 1 for you to Set to your field, and you shuffle the rest back into the Deck. Except the turn it was sent to the GY: You can banish this card and 1 other “Armamegiddo” card from your GY; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of “Project “Okuu”, Armamegiddo Monochromis” once per turn.
main.name: Project “Okuu”, Armamegiddo Monochromis

main.effect:
(This card is never treated as a "Void" card.)
Activate 1 "Voidcast" Continuous or Field Spell from your Deck, then you can reveal 1 "Voidsent" monster in your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Voidcast" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Prismatic Voidlight" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
main.name: Prismatic Voidlight

main.effect:
If “Clear World” is on the field: Apply 1 of these effects.
● Special Summon 1 monster from your hand, also if it mentions “Clear World”, it cannot be destroyed by card effects.
● Destroy Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls, up to the number of monsters they control with different Attributes +1.
If “Clear World” is not on the field: You can banish this card from your GY; place 1 “Clear World” from your GY in your opponent’s Field Zone face-up, also they cannot choose to destroy that card by its own effect while they control it if they have enough LP to pay. You can only use 1 effect of “Prismatic Colorless Burst“ per turn, and only once that turn.
main.name: Prismatic Colorless Burst

main.effect: You can Tribute 3 or more monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Prisma Zbroya" once per turn. You can discard 1 Level 5 or higher monster; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, it can be treated as 2 Tributes for a Tribute Summon, also you can make its Attribute become that monster's original Attribute. If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can destroy cards your opponent controls, up to the number of monsters Tributed for its Summon, and if you do, inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed this way.
main.name: Prisma Zbroya

main.effect: Send 1 "Forge Breaker" monster you control to the GY; Special Summon 2 "Pride Tokens" (Dragon/WIND/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0), also you cannot Special Summon monsters that began the Duel in the Main Deck for the rest of this turn, except "Forge Breaker" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Pride of the Forge Breakers" per turn.
main.name: Pride of the Forge Breakers

main.effect: Level/Rank 2 Aqua monsters you control gain 600 ATK/DEF and cannot be destroyed by battle. When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Prehistoric" monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck except "Paleozoic" or "Prehistoric" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Prehistoric Wetlands" per turn.
main.name: Prehistoric Wetlands

main.effect: This card is treated as a Trap while it is attached to an Xyz Monster as material. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Prehistoric" card from your Deck to the GY. If this card you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Prehistoric" card that is banished or in your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn this effect is activated, except "Paleozoic" and "Prehistoric" monsters. You can only use each effect of "Prehistoric Toad" once per turn.
main.name: Prehistoric Toad

main.effect: You can target 1 "Prehistoric" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them, and if you do, immediately after this Chain resolves, negate the effects of that opponent's destroyed card in the GY for the rest of this turn. If you control an Aqua Xyz Monster: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Prehistoric" or "Paleozoic" monster from your GY, but you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters. You can only use each effect of "Prehistoric Rage" once per turn.

main.effect: You can discard this card, then target 1 "Paleozoic" or "Prehistoric" Trap that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand, but you cannot activate cards or the effects of cards with that card's name for the rest of this turn. ● If your opponent Ritual Summons a Ritual Monster(s), or Special Summons a monster(s) from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to the number of monster card types your opponent controls (Ritual/Fusion/Synchro/Xyz/Pendulum/Link), and if you do, add 1 excavated card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck.
● When your opponent activates a card or effect that would change the name of a card(s) (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; negate that effect.
main.name: Sovereign of Truth

main.effect: Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase, if this card was Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Soulscale Tial" once per turn. During your Main Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: You can activate this effect; this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Soulscale" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) If this card is returned to the hand: You can discard it; Set 1 "Soulscale Burst" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck.
main.name: Soulscale Tial

main.effect: Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase, if this card was Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Soulscale Silva" once per turn. If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can target 1 "Soulscale Burst" card that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card is returned to the hand: You can discard it; Fusion Summon 1 Dragon Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck by using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If Summoning a "Soulscale" Fusion Monster this way, you can also banish monsters from your GY as Fusion Material.
main.name: Soulscale Silva

main.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase, if this card was Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Soulscale Halitus" once per turn. If this card is Normal Summoned or Flipped face-up: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 Dragon Spirit monster from your Deck, ignoring its Summoning Conditions, then, if you discarded a "Soulscale" card, this Summon is treated as a Normal Summon. If this card is returned to the hand: You can discard it; discard 1 card, then apply this effect.
● During the next Standby Phase, draw 2 cards, then discard 1 "Soulscale" card, or if you have none in your hand, shuffle your hand into the Deck.

main.effect: Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase, if this card was Summoned, or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Soulscale Flair" once per turn. If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can add 1 "Soulscale" card from your Deck to your hand, then, if you added a monster, immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Soulscale" monster from your hand. If this card is returned to the hand: You can discard it; Look at your opponent's Extra Deck, and if you do, banish 1 card from it.

main.effect: Cannot be Special Summoned. Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. During the End Phase, if this card was Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return it to the hand. If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can target 1 "Soulscale" card in your GY; add it to your hand. If this card is returned to the hand: You can discard it; Fusion Summon 1 Dragon Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling monsters from your GY into the Deck.

main.effect: Target 1 "Soulscale" monster you control; double its ATK, also, return it to the hand during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY: add 1 "Soulscale" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Soulscale Burst - Surge" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

main.effect: Shuffle 1 of your banished "Soulscale" monsters into the Deck, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Soulscale Burst - Oversoul" once per turn.

main.effect: Banish 1 "Soulscale" Fusion Monster you control; destroy all cards your opponent controls. main.effect:
Send 1 "Simulacrum Core" from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, apply this effect based on where it was sent from, then send 1 "Simulacra" monster from your Extra Deck to the GY, then Fusion Summon 1 "Simulacra" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck with a different Attribute than the sent monsters, by using monsters from your hand and/or shuffling monsters from either GY into the Deck as material.
● Hand: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
● Deck: Banish 1 card from your GY.

main.effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die and apply the appropriate effect, then Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by using this card on the field and by shuffling monsters into the Deck from among each player's banished cards as material.
● 1: Each player banishes 1 WIND monster from their Deck.
● 2: Each player banishes 1 WATER monster from their Deck.
● 3: Each player banishes 1 EARTH monster from their Deck.
● 4: Each player banishes 1 FIRE monster from their Deck.
● 5: Each player banishes 1 LIGHT monster from their Deck.
● 6: Each player banishes 1 DARK monster from their Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Simulacrum Core" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you use this effect, except Fusion Monsters.

main.effect: A terrifying monster that hides in the sand. It's rumored that it's actually made of multiple sentient organisms, which each have highly specialized roles. They create the illusion of a huge monster in order to protect their nest, which they worked hard to build.

main.effect: Special Summon 1 "Thaumatonic" monster from your Deck. You cannot Summon non-"Thaumatonic" monsters to your Main Monster Zones the turn you activate this card. You can only activate 1 "Thaumatonic Summoning" per turn. If this card is destroyed: You can change the battle position of 1 monster on the field.
main.name: Thaumatonic Summoning

main.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Thaumatonic" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Thaumatonic Study". If this card is destroyed: You can destroy 1 "Thaumatonic" card from your hand or field, also add 1 "Thaumatonic" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Thaumatonic Study" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
main.name: Thaumatonic Study

main.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Thaumatonic" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand, then shuffle 1 card from your hand or field into the Deck, except a card activated this Chain. You can only use this effect of "Thaumatonic Researcher" once per turn. You cannot Summon non-"Thaumatonic" monsters to your Main Monster Zones the turn you use this effect.
main.name: Thaumatonic Researcher

main.effect: Target 1 card on the field; destroy 1 "Thaumatonic" card you control or in your hand, except a Quick-Play Spell you control, also, after that, you can destroy that target. You cannot Summon non-"Thaumatonic" monsters to your Main Monster Zones the turn you activate this card. You can only activate 1 "Thaumatonic Removal" per turn.
main.name: Thaumatonic Removal

main.effect: When a card or effect is activated: Negate the activation, then destroy 1 other "Thaumatonic" card you control. You can only activate 1 "Thaumatonic Disruption" per turn.
main.name: Thaumatonic Disruption

main.effect: Destroy this card, then equip 1 "Thaumatonic" card from your Deck or Extra Deck to a monster on the field, and if you do, you can destroy that "Thaumatonic" card. You cannot Summon non-"Thaumatonic" monsters to your Main Monster Zones the turn you activate this card. You can only activate 1 "Thaumatonic Delivery" per turn.
main.name: Thaumatonic Delivery

main.effect: If this card is destroyed or used as Link Material: Destroy 1 "Thaumatonic" card in your Deck, then you can return 1 Set card on your field to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Thaumatonic Assistant" once per turn. You cannot Summon non-"Thaumatonic" monsters to your Main Monster Zones the turn you use this effect.
main.name: Thaumatonic Assistant

main.effect: If this card is destroyed: Special Summon it. (Quick Effect): You can equip this card with 1 "Thaumatonic" card from your Extra Deck, and the next time you activate an effect, destroy 1 "Thaumatonic" card you control immediately after it resolves. You can only use each effect of "Thaumatonic Alchemist" once per turn.
main.name: Thaumatonic Alchemist

main.effect: Target 1 face-up monster on the field with an Ice Counter(s); destroy it, then place Ice Counters on face-up monster(s) on the field equal to the number of Ice Counters that destroyed monster had +1. If a monster(s) you control with an Ice Counter would be destroyed, you can banish this card from your GY, instead.
main.name: That's Snow Accident!

main.effect: When this card is activated: You can take 1 "Hasth That Evær'Wood" from your Deck and either place it in your Pendulum Zone, or place it into your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap. Cards placed in the Spell & Trap Zone this way gain their Pendulum Effects. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Monster Card "That Evær'Wood" from your Pendulum or Spell & Trap Zone. The first time this card would be destroyed or banished by a card effect each turn, you can instead destroy 1 Monster Card "That Evær'Wood" you control. You can only activate 1 "That Evær'Wood Vol. I" per turn.
main.name: That Evær'Wood Vol. I

main.effect: Add 1 "Spyro the Dragon" from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 card that mentions "Spyro the Dragon" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Thank You for Releasing Me!" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
main.name: Thank You for Releasing Me!

main.effect: A talented first year with a penchant for the arts, Terri sings his heart out. Yes, he was going to be late for his first day, but so many people wanted to hear him sing. Was he going to disappoint? Absolutely not. He sings, thinking of the friend he'll be meeting soon enough.
main.name: Terri of the Learned Wings
main.pendulum_effect: During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone, then you can place 1 "Learned Wings" Pendulum Monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Terri of the Learned Wings" once per turn.

main.effect: If a "Tenyi" non-Effect Monster(s) would be destroyed by a card effect, you can send this card you control to the GY instead. If a non-Effect Monster you control battles an opponent's monster: Your battling monster gains ATK equal to that opponent's monster's ATK until the end of the Battle Phase. If a non-Effect Monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; either negate its effects or destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Tenyi Spirit Fury" once per turn.
main.name: Tenyi Spirit Fury

main.effect: When a card(s) is added from the Main Deck to your opponent's hand, except during the Draw Phase, while you control no face-up Spell Cards: They must banish 1 of those cards, and if they do, immediately after this effect resolves, Ritual Summon 1 "Aethery" Ritual Monster from your hand or GY, by Tributing 1 monster from your hand or field whose Level equals or exceeds the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. Until the end of your next turn after this effect resolves, you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters, except "Aethery" Ritual Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Temperance of the Aethery" per turn.
main.name: Temperance of the Aethery

main.effect: During your Standby Phase: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Architect", you can target 2 monsters your opponent controls instead. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Punishers" per turn.
main.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Punishers

main.effect: During your Standby Phase: Add 1 Level 4 "Suzerain" monster from your Deck to your hand. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Apparitions", you can also Special Summon 1 "Suzerain Marquess" from your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Progenitor" per turn.
main.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Progenitor

main.effect: During your Standby Phase: Add 1 "Suzerain" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except a "Tales of Suzerain" card. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Historian", you can also add 1 "Tales of Suzerain" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Overseer" per turn.

main.effect: During your Standby Phase: Target 1 Level 4 "Suzerain" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Progenitor", you can also target 1 non-Level 4 "Suzerain" monster in your GY. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Historian" per turn.

main.effect:
During your Standby Phase: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon 1 "Suzerain" Synchro, Xyz or Link Monster from your Extra Deck by using monsters you control as material. If you activated at least 2 other "Tales of Suzerain" cards this turn, you can also apply the following effect at the end of the Standby Phase.
● Fusion Summon 1 "Suzerain" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by sending monsters you control to the GY or banishing monsters from your GY as Fusion Material.
main.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Ascension

main.effect: During your Standby Phase: Discard 1 other "Suzerain" card; draw 2 cards. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Overseer", you can draw 1 additional card. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Architect" per turn.
main.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Architect

main.effect: During your Standby Phase: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. If the last Spell you activated this turn was "Tales of Suzerain - The Punishers", you can target 2 Spells/Traps your opponent controls instead. You can only activate 1 "Tales of Suzerain - The Apparitions" per turn.
main.name: Tales of Suzerain - The Apparitions

main.effect: Target 1 card on the field; Tribute 1 "Tacticore" monster from your hand or field, and if you do, destroy that target.

main.effect: If you control a WIND Fairy monster with 0 ATK, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Sylphale Zephyrus Thistle" once per turn this way. If a "Sylphale" monster effect is activated, while this card is on the field or in the GY: You can banish 1 "Sylphale Zephyrus Thistle" from your GY; send 1 "Sylphale" card from your Deck to the GY, then, if this card is on the field, you can make this card gain or lose original 900 DEF. You can only use this effect of "Sylphale Zephyrus Thistle" once per turn.
main.name: Sylphale Zephyrus Thistle

2 face-up Machine monsters

2 Level 12 monsters

At the start of the Damage Step, if a monster you control battles: You can detach 1 material from this card; destroy 1 card in the same column as that monster you control, and if you do, if it was a monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half its original ATK, also halve any battle damage taken from that battle. 2+ LIGHT and/or Pyro monsters

2+ Level 5 monsters
If you use a monster(s), with a Level, that is owned by your opponent and/or a “Vampire” monster for the Xyz Summon of this card, treat it as Level 5. main.effect: "Fawn often likes to wonder around fairy's forest where Aphrodite resides, overjoyed that a deity has taken residence in wonderland"

main.pendulum_effect: This card can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is mentioned on the Fusion Monster Card, but the other materials must be correct. If a monster(s) is Summoned OR a non-Effect Pendulum Monster(s) is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck by banishing this card and 1 "Wondertale" or non-Effect Pendulum Monster you control or in your Pendulum Zone as Fusion Material, but its ATK/DEF become 0 until the end of the next turn. You can only use this effect of "Wondertale Dimension Traveler Alice" once per turn.

main.effect: "Alice continues her journey to find a means to defeat Witch Theodora, and save Wonderland once again"
main.name: Wondertale Crystal Bearer Alice
main.pendulum_effect: If a monster(s) is Summoned OR If a Normal Pendulum Monster(s) is added to your Extra Deck face-up while you control a Fusion or Normal Monster: You can make the ATK/DEF of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls become 0, and if it does, destroy this card. You can only use this effect of "Wondertale Crystal Bearer Alice" once per turn.

main.effect: "Hahaha, you never cease to amuse me Alice, but how will you fair against Theodora?"

You can only use this effect of "Wondertale Cheshire Cat" once per turn.

main.effect: "The young girl who has entered the world known as Wonderland, she has saved Wonderland from the evil Red Queen, but a more evil force bears its fangs at wonderland"

(This card is always treated as a "Wondertale" card.)

main.effect:
Our Story begins unlike most others, in a quiet little brook.
Their a lady sat, enjoying kettle, tart, and book.
There her mind wandered to a world That Never Could.
And yet, as she left her shadow, there a peculiar sign stood. 
A words most strange for it, "That Evær'Wood."
- That Evær'Wood Vol. I
main.name: Hasth That Evær'Wood
main.pendulum_effect: When a monster(s) "That Evær'Wood" you control are destroyed, you can place any number of them in your Spell & Trap Zone(s) as Continuous Traps, instead of placing them in the face-up Extra Deck. Pendulum Monsters placed this way gain their Pendulum Effects. During the Main Phase: You can add 1 Pendulum Monster "That Evær'Wood" from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up, and if you do, change this card's Pendulum Scale to be the same as that Pendulum Monster's until the end of this turn, or, if this card is a Continuous Trap, gain LP equal to that monster's Level x 200 instead. You can only use this effect of "Hasth That Evær'Wood" once per turn.

main.effect:
Just beginning her first year, Hao watches the other students flutter by. She exchanges smiles with the passersby as she waits patiently for her exuberant friend to show up. She sees a fellow student falter, dropping her books. Hao immediately picks one up her in beak and offers it to the flustered student, smiling.
"It's nothing, really. My pleasure to help!"
main.name: Hao of the Learned Wings
main.pendulum_effect: If a "Learned Wings" card(s) is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can take 1 of those cards, and either add it to your hand or place it in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Hao of the Learned Wings" once per turn.
